analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0xe86914e7dcdcf90b10872fdf06ac1cea56e8d118.sol:
	Contract DecalinxCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0xe86914e7dcdcf90b10872fdf06ac1cea56e8d118.sol#211)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0xe86914e7dcdcf90b10872fdf06ac1cea56e8d118.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0xe86914e7dcdcf90b10872fdf06ac1cea56e8d118.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0xe86914e7dcdcf90b10872fdf06ac1cea56e8d118.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
